taskPrompt:
Review the AgentForge project state (PROJECT.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, memory files). You are building the system you are running on - use this meta-perspective to identify high-value improvements.

Create a prioritized task breakdown for Sprint 1 focused on:
1. Server-side task persistence (so agents can actually create/update tasks)
2. Orchestration logic (how to sequence agent runs)
3. Agent handoff protocol (how PM hands off to Engineer, etc.)

Document your task breakdown in your session notepad. Include:
- An epic for each major area
- Stories with clear 'done when' criteria  
- Implementation tasks assigned to engineer
- Testing tasks assigned to qa
- Priority using MoSCoW (critical/high/medium/low)

Note: The agentforge CLI may not work since the server doesn't exist yet. Document the tasks in your notepad instead.
